looking at the code in [IgnPkgConfig.cmake](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/55d47f3029a2028c40890f54d09071fd4250151d/cmake/IgnPkgConfig.cmake#lines-94), there is some logic in determining whether or not to pass the `QUIET` arg but I don't see how that would get set. Maybe it's something to fix in `ign_pkg_check_modules_quiet`

Note the above patch produces a warning on ubuntu bionic about unrecognized argument `QUIET`. I’ll fix that and make the same changes to FindOGRE2.cmake
